data.eml:eml: Metaperipatus inae sp. nov. (Onychophora: Peripatopsidae) from Chile with a novel ovarian type and dermal insemination

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mayer, Georg (2007): Metaperipatus inae sp. nov. (Onychophora: Peripatopsidae) from Chile with a novel ovarian type and dermal insemination. Zootaxa 1440: 21-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175982
